chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸, ever punctual, croaked, "Chirp! Chirp! 10 PM! Medicine time!" at Beatrice the chick. Beatrice, engrossed in watching worms wrestling 🤼‍♂️ on TV, waved a wing dismissively. "Later, Ferd!" she chirped. Hours flew. Beatrice woke up, feathers puffed. "My throat!" she squeaked. Ferdinand sighed. "Ribbit. Now you sound like ME!" 😭 He tossed her the medicine. "Drink it. And next time, listen to your froggy pharmacist!" 💊
